page.title: 03FARMING in GIRVAN
page.content:
{The Sea
There are 24 fishing boats based in {GIRVAN,}with the main catches being herring,prawns and white fish. Depending upon type a boat will have a crew of between two and six whose pay is calculated by a system of shares. All fish landed at {GIRVAN }is taken to AYR to be sold.Boats are very expensive. A 50 footer can cost Â£400 000 and take Â£1000 per week to run. {The Land
Farming is arable and dairy--- cattle,sheep, grain and silage.{ {Ayrshire}new potatoes,grown in the coastal fields,are the first to reach the market.
